Class SentenceReverser

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SentenceReverserTest

    public class SentenceReverser
extends java.lang.Object
    Program to reverse sentences entered by the user. This exists to get practice with JUnit and EGit.
    Author:
    ellen.spertus@gmail.com (Ellen Spertus), ctaymor@gmail.com (Caroline Taymor)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Solicits sentences from the user, printing each one back to standard output with the words reversed and punctuation omitted.
      java.lang.String reverseSentence(java.lang.String s)
      Returns parameter reversed word-wise with punctuation removed.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Solicits sentences from the user, printing each one back to standard output with the words reversed and punctuation omitted. The program can be exited by entering "quit".
        Parameters:
        args - ignored

      • reverseSentence

        public java.lang.String reverseSentence(java.lang.String s)
        Returns parameter reversed word-wise with punctuation removed.
        Parameters:
        s - the sentence to be reversed
        Returns:
        the reversed sentence as a String
